name: @jcendal/nx-angular-generators-derived
description: Nx Angular generators wrapper that mimics the old 'derived' behavior for component generation.

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && webpack --config webpack.config.js && tsc && npm run build:cli && npm run bundle:dts && npm run clean:dts && npm run set-permissions
scripts.build:cli: tsc src/cli.ts --outDir lib --module commonjs --target es2015 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --declaration false && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = fs.readFileSync('lib/cli.js', 'utf8'); if (!content.startsWith('#!/')) { fs.writeFileSync('lib/cli.js', '#!/usr/bin/env node\n' + content); }"
scripts.set-permissions: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const cliPath = path.join(__dirname, 'lib', 'cli.js'); if (fs.existsSync(cliPath)) { fs.chmodSync(cliPath, '755'); }"

author: Jorge Cendal <jorgecendal95@gmail.com>

engines.yarn: Please use NPM instead of yarn to install dependencies
